text:
@realDonaldTrump @Varneyco Your friend and supporter #HermanCain just died from #coronavirus after being infected at #TrumpTulsaRally.

He joined 150,000 Americans that have died from the disease.

And you are pimping Pizza.  (Illegally) 
WTF is wrong with you?
